thread.title: NEW PRODUCT RELEASE – ELEARNINGFORCE LAUNCHES SHAREPOINT LMS 4.4 FOR MORE EFFICIENT AND PERSONALIZED LEARNING MANAGEMENT
thread.title_full: NEW PRODUCT RELEASE – ELEARNINGFORCE LAUNCHES SHAREPOINT LMS 4.4 FOR MORE EFFICIENT AND PERSONALIZED LEARNING MANAGEMENT

author: prbuzz.com
title: NEW PRODUCT RELEASE – ELEARNINGFORCE LAUNCHES SHAREPOINT LMS 4.4 FOR MORE EFFICIENT AND PERSONALIZED LEARNING MANAGEMENT
text:
ELEARNINGFORCE International to host a free webinar about the exciting features part of SharePoint LMS 4.4 – the newest version of the award winning learning management system.
Immersion Technology Services is excited to announce the launch of SharePoint LMS 4.4 – the latest version of SharePoint LMS . Added features and functions will provide more focused training to motivate learners, enable specialization in specific areas of expertise, and help organizations stride ahead of their competition. These new features will enhance an already advanced suite of capabilities that has enabled over three million users to create learning pathways to develop skills, manage competencies, and realize potentials. Built on top of the successful Microsoft SharePoint platform, users can expect to see the following additions and improvements:
• SharePoint LMS Curriculum – Create job specific training plans, evaluate your training, and plan ahead to develop training for your next career move
• SharePoint Search – Find the course that is best for your role by using the integrated SharePoint search functionality
• Fill competency gaps – Courses will grant competencies automatically
• New Course types – Create single content courses in only a few easy steps for improved focus
“ELEARNINGFORCE is very proud to present this new release to our clients” said Bjarne Mortensen, CEO ELEARNINGFORCE International. “SharePoint 4.4 includes a lot of enhancements that will affect our customers’ daily working routines in a very positive way.”
“As the sole US distributor for ELEARNINGFORCE International we look forward to bringing improved business processes to our users here in the United States” said Thomas Runds, CTO at Immersion Technology Services, “We want to help take training to the next level with more efficient and personalized learning management.”
For more details about SharePoint LMS 4.4 ELEARNINGFORCE International will be hosting a free webinar on Tuesday, September 1 and Thursday, September 10. For additional information and registration click here .
About Immersion Technology Services
Immersion Technology Services (ITS) creates Business Infrastructure Transformation solutions for its clients. The company provides expert consulting and professional services in three different segments: enterprise education (LMS), identity governance and administration (IGA), and migrations. ITS customers include leaders in the in commercial, government and military space. ITS is headquartered in Edgewater, Maryland with operations throughout the US & Canada.
ITS partners with industry leaders such as Dell and Microsoft Gold Partner ELEARNINGFORCE to support clients through processes related to enterprise Knowledge Management and Collaboration. For more about Immersion Technology Services, visit the company’s website at http://www.immersiontechnologyservices.com/
About ELEARNINGFORCE
ELEARNINGFORCE products bring effective learning management to SharePoint® and Office 365®. SharePoint LMS and LMS 365 blend seamlessly with any established SharePoint® infrastructure, eliminating complex integration, time-consuming development, and unwanted complexity. Learners intuitively access learning plans, courses, personal progress reports, certificates, and more - from anywhere within the daily SharePoint business process.
ELEARNINGFORCE International started in 2005 and has now 4+ million users in more than 40 countries worldwide. ELEARNINGFORCE is a Microsoft Strategic and Gold Partner. For more about ELEARNINGFORCE International, visit the company’s website at http://www.elearningforce.com/
